job_history.work_description: Rail logistics work in-bounding and out-bounding trains in three different states, for a local railroad. Ensuring vins from big three and other automotive companies were on the correct trains. Data Entry of all switch Instructions. Document train information, along with verifying waybills, for vins correct destination. Matching waybill numbers. Ensuring that all information inputted is accurate giving attention to detail.

Answering telephones and welcoming guests. Receiving and directing visitors. Word processing, photocopying, filing, and faxing. Assist in scheduling and organizing complex activities such as meetings and department activities for members of the Management Team. Maintaining/reordering office supplies. Coordinate travel arrangement for employees and consultants as necessary. Coordinated work activities of subordinates and staff.
Project Manager assisting 36th District Court with transition from one HRIS/Payroll System ADP 5.0 to ADP HR-B and Workforce Now; servicing 400 employees.

Administered monthly payroll for 30-employees for 3 different sites. Managed all employee benefits, building, contents, D&O, liability for multiple sites. Reviewed job descriptions developed by hiring manager, and ensured FLSA compliance. Coordinated formal employment offers; pre-employment drug screen and background check(s). Created and maintained employee files; employee database.

Facilitated the hiring and placement process for over 100 different positions. Supported disciplinary action and terminations including COBRA administration. Conducted employee training of Benefits eXpert and IPAY systems. Administered employee welfare benefits and open enrollment. Organized return-to-work program, and employee health and safety training. Prepared monthly reconciliation for temporary employment accounts.

Prepared monthly reconciliation for healthcare accounts for BCBS, BCN, HAP, Total Healthcare, Omnicare, Delta Dental, SunLife and Mutual of Omaha Life Insurance. Employee Census Report creation. Responded to inquires/concerns regarding employee healthcare benefits. Experience with Worker's Compensation, STD/LTD, FMLA, ADA, Child Support Orders, COBRA Administration, LOA, and The Healthcare Reform Act. Handled recruitment and placement of union employees. Prepared paperwork for new hires and terminating employees with completion of paperwork. Completed ADP system reports for HR compliance.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience managing projects, including transitioning from one HRIS/Payroll System to another, and coordinating work activities of subordinates and staff, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Administered monthly payroll for multiple employees and sites, and prepared monthly reconciliation for temporary employment accounts, indicating strong proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: HR Administration
skills.explanation: Has over a decade of experience in HR administration, including employee benefits, recruitment, and compliance, showing expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Has experience with data entry, including switch instructions and employee databases, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience coordinating work activities of subordinates and staff, and leading projects, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience answering telephones, welcoming guests, and responding to employee inquiries, showing a solid working proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Organizational Skills
skills.explanation: Has experience coordinating complex activities, such as meetings and department activities, and maintaining employee files, showing a solid working proficiency in organizational skills.

skills.name: Attention to Detail
skills.explanation: Has experience verifying waybills and ensuring accurate data entry, showing a solid working proficiency in attention to detail.

skills.name: Logistics Coordination
skills.explanation: Has some experience with rail logistics, including in-bounding and out-bounding trains, showing some practical experience.

skills.name: Healthcare Administration
skills.explanation: Has some experience with healthcare benefits, including employee welfare benefits and open enrollment, showing some practical experience.
